column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I walked into the train station , stood in line , and purchased a round trip ticket to Chicago .
#id=2
#text=I placed my ticket in my pocket and then walked outside to wait for the train .
#id=3
#text=I stood next to many other people that were also waiting for the train .
#id=4
#text=We heard the train coming when it was still a long distance away .
#id=5
#text=It finally pulled up to the tracks .
#id=6
#text=Everyone lined up to get inside the doors .
#id=7
#text=The doors open and we all filed in .
#id=8
#text=I found a seat by myself at the back of the train .
#id=9
#text=I sat down and looked out the window at the passing towns .
#text=After awhile , the announcer said the next and final stop would be Chicago .
#text=I stood up and walked over to the doors .
#text=The train pulled into the station , making a loud screeching noise .
#text=It slowly came to a stop inside the station .
#text=The doors opened and all the passengers climbed off the train , and into Union Station in Chicago .
